/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is teeming with life, with numerous cars and buses navigating the roads. The roads themselves are lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the roads, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
